content: Career General Asked by AnonymousAsked on 21 Oct 2018How to find co-founder and a team to start a business?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Kenneth Lou, Co-founder at SeedlyLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 24 Oct 2018Hey! I would say... network network and network. Keep going out there and start building a reputation as well.Focus one 1 or 2 verticals which you think you are simply an expert at:For non-tech founders:Your network with investorsYour business strategy accumenProven experience scaling marketing strategies at low costDeep experience in design (or UIUX)For tech founders:A deep tech skillsetKnown to ship production level productsScaled a product and engineering team beforeThe above two people would be able to go ahead to develop a MVP (minimum viable product) and use it to either generate revenue or raise funding (with a story) to move the product further down the line with more users and etc. All the best :) happy to answer your questions here by replying.0 comments2
